OOC: Pardon me for this OOC message, but my thoughts on this will be expres=
sed. I think the problem here is that there is no one taking enough action,=
 number 1, there are no fights and no evil plans being cooked up by the evi=
l team. There needs to be wars started like in the old days and some intere=
sting stories that can affect everyone written as well. Number 2, the chara=
cter limit prevents people from making their own storylines up, and thus pe=
ople usually have to rely on hoping they won't get ignored and waiting for =
their bots to receive orders from the commanders. Things similar to this ar=
e what killed my first Beast Wars RPG. But hey, I'm not telling you anythin=
g you don't already know...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Tuesday, February 25, =
2003 10:55 AM
  Subject: New poll for nbwrpg



  Enter your vote today!  A=
 new poll has been created for the 
  nbwrpg group:

  Do you think the arr=
ival of many new (or
  old) players and new characters will
  have a boosti=
ng effect on this RPG? 

    o Ya betcha! 
    o A small one, I think... 
 =
   o Talk to my lawyer. 
    o THEY ALL SUCK! IT WON'T CHANGE! 
    o Ah! N=
othing better than a Fusionnaire by the beach! 


  To vote, please visit t=
he following web page:

  http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=
=3D1041697  

  Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
=
  not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
  web=
 site listed above.

  Thanks!







        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
      =
        ADVERTISEMENT
             
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! G=
roups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
